original_title: MoU inked to develop infrastructure for Sobadhanavi LNG power plant
original_body_lines: A memorandum of understanding (MoU) was signed, a short while ago, to develop infrastructure for the storage, regasification and supply of liquefied natural gas (LNG) for the Sobadhanavi Combined Cycle Power Plant at Kerawalapitiya.

The agreement was signed between Sri Lanka’s LTL Holdings Limited and India’s Petronet LNG Limited, under the patronage of the Minister of Power and Energy Kanchana Wijesekara and the Deputy High Commissioner of India in Sri Lanka.
